output_list.reason: The mintToken function allows an integer overflow in the totalSupply variable, enabling the owner to mint an arbitrary large amount of tokens.
The transferFrom function has a wrong logic where it returns false if the balances or allowances are insufficient, allowing unauthorized transfers.
The ToOwner function has no access control, allowing any user to claim ownership and funds.
The mintToken function allows the owner to mint an arbitrary large amount of tokens, devaluing the token.
The claimThrone function has an integer overflow in the refund amount, allowing the contract to be drained of funds.
